t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon Basics (formerly written as AmazonBasics) is a private label that offers home goods, office supplies, and tech accessories. The line was launched in 2009. As of December 2017, Amazon Basics is the best-selling private label brand on Amazon.com. In November 2018, AmazonBasics expanded ...

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is getting rid of dozens of in-house clothing brands as it faces a potential antitrust lawsuit from the FTC, according to a report from The Wall Street Journal.

t: Amazon In House Brands: Amazon shuts down in-house brands to cut costs - Times of India
s: August 11, 2023 - Amazon is shutting down in-house brands such as Solimo, Wag and Mama Bear to avoid antitrust scrutiny and cut costs. In an email, Matt Taddy, Amazon's VP of Private Brands, stated that the firm was "thoughtful" about its private brand selection, and if items "aren't resonating with customers" ...

t: A guide to the best Amazon in-house fashion brands, from workout gear to winter coats
s: November 9, 2020 - Amazon's in-house lingerie brand, Mae, is home to a line of practical T-shirt bras and packs of no-show underwear in neutral colors. In addition to the basics, Mae has plenty of pretty lace bralettes in various styles, with options that include high necklines, light padding, and cutouts.

t: Amazon axes some private-label brands as part of wider cost cuts
s: October 19, 2023 - Amazon sells goods from its own brands, in addition to those from third-party sellers and other retailers, on its sprawling e-commerce website.

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).
